item.heading: 3 Services
item.intro: Calvary Austin announces three services starting Sunday morning March 3, 2002 at 8, 9:45 and 11:30 am.

full.p: Calvary Austin announces three services starting Sunday morning March 3, 2002 at 8, 9:45 and 11:30 am.
View the worship and message by Pastor Allen Rigg for God's vision for Calvary Austin on the Web in Real Video.
Good Friday service on March 29, 2002 at 7 pm.
